text: Balsara is an Indian surname similar to Bulsara which indicates ancestry from Bulsar (Valsad). Notable people with this surname include. *Bhicaji Balsara, first Indian to be naturalised as a U.S. citizen *Christina Balsara, married name of Christina Stone, Singaporean model and businesswoman *Poras Balsara, American engineer *Sam Balsara, Indian advertising executive
title: Balsara
